title: Multiplication Rule
text: We note that by the multiplication rule, P(D AND $$B')=P\left(D\right) P\left(B'|D\right)$$. We also note that $$P\left(B|D\right)+P\left(B'|D\right)=1$$, so we can use this to our advantage.

title: Determining P(B'|D)
text: What is $$P(B'|D)=1-P(B|D)$$? Hint: we found P(B|D) in the previous step.
